description.en:
Paraplegic ex-sniper Ha Yiha is getting a fresh start in the VR game “Middle Earth.” He hopes to become a powerful player and earn enough money to afford surgery, but there’s a small problem… an untimely logout leaves him playing as a musketeer, the game’s most ineffective class. Luckily, he’s able to use his real-life sharpshooting skills to take musketeering to new heights. As his unprecedented progress turns heads and prompts new quests, Yiha thinks he’s got a shot at success, but he may have just landed himself directly in danger’s sights.

description.ja:
いつも完璧を勝ち取る吉田ローガン。 しかし、不意の事故により下半身不随の障害を負い、社会から捨てられる。 絶望に陥った彼に訪れた、革命的なVRゲーム「ミドルアース」による新しい世界が始まる。 だが、とあるトラブルによりキャラクター選びを大間違い！一番能力の低い「マスケット銃士」を選んでしまう！ “クッソ…俺は他の奴と違う。俺が本物のマスケット銃の力を見せてやる！”

description.ko:
"하 중사, 이 미친놈아. 또 만발인 거 알아?"

이제 말뚝 박을 일만 남은 명사수 부사관 하이하.
그러나 불의의 사고로 하반신을 못 쓰게 되어 사회로 내쳐졌다.
절망에 빠져있던 그에게 혁명적인 VR 게임 [미들 어스]가 새로운 삶을 선사한다.
가상현실 게임인 [미들 어스]에서 획득한 돈은 현실의 돈이 된다!

하지만 캐릭터 생성 때 가장 성능이 낮은 캐릭터를 고르게 되는 바람에 망하게 생겼다!

"난 다르다. 이것이 내 마지막이야!"

흑색화약, 쇠구슬, 꼬질대. 진짜 '머스킷티어'가 무엇인지 보여주마!

description.ru:
Сериал про гиперреалистичную фэнтезийную игру! «Сержант Ха, ты сумасшедший ублюдок. Ты выстрелил еще раз в пулю?» Меткий стрелок Ха ЛиХа просто хотел навсегда стать частью армии. Однако из-за несчастного случая он стал парализованным и был отброшен обратно в общество. Революционная игра VR [Средиземье] подарила ему новую жизнь. Деньги, полученные в [Средиземье], имеют реальную ценность! Тем не менее, он испортил свой шанс, выбрав персонажа самого низкого уровня! «Я не такой, как другие. Это все, что у меня есть». Черный порох, железные шары и шомполы ... Я вам всем покажу, что такое настоящий «мушкетер»!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%ED%83%84%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EC%88%98/2470)

description.th:
ฮาลีฮา นักแม่นปืนแห่งทหารกองหนุนได้เกิดอุบัติเหตุระหว่างขนย้ายดินปืนในค่ายทหาร ทำให้เขาสูญเสียประสาทสัมผัส ของขาทั้งสองข้าง เดินไม่ได้ และต้องใช้เงินผ่าตัดเป็นจำนวนสองพันล้านวอน

หลังจากที่แม่ของเขาเห็นเขาเศร้า หมดอาลัยที่สูญเสียขา ทำให้เธอซื้อเครื่องเล่นเกมเสมือนจริงมาให้เขาเล่น ซึ่งใช้ในการหาเงินได้ด้วย เขารู้สึกดีใจมากที่ได้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้งแม้จะเป็นในเกม และเขาก็ได้ใช้ทักษะนักแม่นปืนของเขากับเกมนี้ด้วย

เขาหวังว่าจะสามารถหาเงินจากการเล่นเกมมาผ่าตัดขาตัวเองให้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้ง

description.es-la: ¡Una serie sobre un juego de fantasía hiperrealista! "Sargent Ha, loco bastardo. ¿Disparó otra ronda completa de tiros al blanco?" El francotirador Ha Lee Ha simplemente quería ser parte del ejército para siempre. Sin embargo, debido a un desafortunado accidente, quedó parapléjico y fue devuelto a la sociedad. El revolucionario juego de realidad virtual [Middle Earth] le presentó una nueva vida. ¡El dinero obtenido en [la Tierra Media] tiene valor en el mundo real! Sin embargo, ¡arruinó su oportunidad al seleccionar el personaje de nivel más bajo! "No soy como los demás. Esto es todo lo que tengo". Pólvora negra, bolas de hierro y baquetas ... ¡Les mostraré lo que es un verdadero 'mosquetero'!
description.pt-br:
Uma série sobre um jogo de fantasia hiper-realista!  
  
“Sargento Ha, seu louco bastardo. Você acertou todos os alvos outra vez?”  
  
O atirador Ha LeeHa simplesmente queria fazer parte do exército para sempre. No entanto, devido a um infeliz acidente, ele ficou paraplégico e foi jogado de volta à sociedade.  
  
O revolucionário jogo de realidade virtual [Terra Média] apresentou-lhe uma nova vida. O dinheiro obtido na [Terra Média] tem valor no mundo real! Ainda assim, ele arruinou sua chance ao selecionar o personagem de nível mais baixo!  
  
“Eu não sou como os outros. Isso é tudo que tenho.”  
  
Pólvora preta, bolas de ferro e varetas… Vou mostrar a todos o que é um verdadeiro ‘mosqueteiro’!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%ED%83%84%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EC%88%98/2470)

description.en:
The naïve Yvona is ready to do anything for her amazing fiancé! Summon magical beasts and let him take the glory? Sure! Wreck her body for a powerful spell and die for him? Yes! Watch him secretly embrace her trusted cousin Tristan with passion and deride her openly? Oka— wait. What? Just then, Yvona dies... and wakes up a year in the past with a burdened heart. Armed with her knowledge, Yvona's ready to fight for herself. And hmm, maybe form an alliance with the coldhearted Duke of Azentine...

---
I died miserably on the day I found out the truth. The truth that my fiancé had a hidden lover, and it was my very own male cousin.

On the second morning, after my 20th birthday, a miracle happened. From that point on, I decided not to believe in love anymore. I want to have a relationship with no strings attached and without any superficial feelings such as love.

"Duke Agentine, will you marry me?"

This proposal was nothing more than a marriage to keep up appearances and without love involved.

---

description.fr: Je suis morte misérablement, le jour où j’ai découvert la vérité. La vérité, c’est que mon fiancé avait un amant caché et c’était mon propre cousin. Le lendemain de mon 20e anniversaire, un miracle s’est produit. A partir de là, j’ai décidé de ne plus croire à l’amour. Je veux avoir une relation sans aucune condition et sans sentiments superficiels tels que l’amour. «Duke Agentine, voulez-vous m’épouser?» Cette proposition n’était rien de plus qu’un mariage pour garder les apparences et sans amour impliqué.
description.id:
Di hari kedua setelah ulang tahunku yang ke-20, sebuah keajaiban terjadi. Pada hari itu: aku mengetahui sebauh kenyataan: tunanganku memiliki selingkuhan, seorang sepupuku satu-satunya. Sejak itu, aku sudah tidak lagi percaya dengan yang namanya cinta, dan mati dengan mengenaskan.

Ketika aku terbangun, aku kembali ke masa lalu. Kali ini, aku hanya ingin memiliki hubungan tanpa adanya ikatan, dan tidak lain tidak bukan hanya karena sebuah kepentingan. Jadi, aku memberinya lamaran pernikahan, hanya untuk mencapai kepentingan bersama. "Duk Agentine, maukah kamu menikah denganku?"
description.mn: Үнэнийг олж мэдсэн тэр өдөр... Би өрөвдөлтэйгөөр нас барсан. Тэрхүү үнэн гэвэл намайг хэн бэ гэдгээр минь хардаг гэж санаж ирсэн сүйт залуу маань үеэлтэй маань янаг амрагийн холбоотой байсан гэх явдал. Би дэндүү харалган явж. Гэвч гайхамшиг биелэлээ олон, би жилийн өмнөхрүүгээ буцаж ирсэн. Энэ мөчөөс эхлэн би ахиж хайр гээч зүйлд итгэхгүй. Хэн нэгний хайрыг хүсч, түүний төлөө өөрийгөө золиослохгүй! Зөвхөн өөрийнхөө төлөө амьдрах болно!
description.pt-br: Eu morri miseravelmente, no dia em que descobri a verdade. A verdade é que meu noivo tinha um amante escondido e era meu primo.Na segunda manhã, depois do meu aniversário de 20 anos, aconteceu um milagre. A partir daí, decidi não acreditar mais no amor.Eu quero ter um relacionamento sem amarras e sem sentimentos superficiais, como o amor."Duquesa Agentine, quer se casar comigo?"Essa proposta nada mais era do que um casamento para manter as aparências e sem o amor envolvido.

title.en: The Great Mage of the Hero’s Party Reincarnates

altTitles.en: The Rebirth of the Hero's Party's Archmage

altTitles.es-la: El renacimiento del archimago del grupo del héroe

description.en:
At age 13, the genius wizard Rin embarked on a journey with Lista and the hero party to defeat the great evil known as “the Abyss,” which sought to plunge the world into chaos. But as the battle grew more intense, Rin’s body succumbed to the dark poison of the Abyss, putting his life in grave danger.

With the words “I’ll come back,” Rin’s soul entered a forced dormancy, only to reawaken 300 years later as a noble boy. Starting his second life in a peaceful world, Rin discovers that on one side of the world, the destined forces of darkness are beginning to stir once more.
description.es-la: El genio mago Lynn se embarca en un gran viaje a la edad de 13 años. Junto con el grupo de héroes, liderado por Esther, su objetivo es derrotar al gran malvado "Abismo" que pretende llevar al mundo al caos. Sin embargo, las batallas se vuelven cada vez más feroces y en el momento final, Lynn sucumbe al oscuro veneno del "Abismo". Dejando atrás las palabras "Volveré", el alma de Lynn permanece dormida durante 300 años, antes de resucitar en el cuerpo de un niño de noble cuna. Así comienza su segunda vida en un mundo pacífico. Pero mientras tanto, una fuerza oscura está acechando una vez más, amenazando con hundir al mundo en la confusión una vez más.

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent! 

---
Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in [Pre-Seralization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).
description.es: En la casa donde vive con su hermana, Hi-chan, la amiga de su hermana, se queda frecuentemente. Ella tiene una cara perfectamente linda, y además de eso, no tiene sentido del espacio personal. Asahi, un estudiante de preparatoria otaku, ¿quedará a su merced...? ¡El popular one-shop “The Cutest Girl Closest to Me” ha sido retitulado y serializado!
description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?

description.en: Jace, an Academic Honours student, once had a very bright future! However, his life has gone downhill ever since he punched a noble classmate. When he finally manages to get a chance to work as a private tutor… The duke is so handsome that he cannot concentrate!

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロイン救済計画

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

description.en:
Ever since Kang Seol was a child, he's had strange dreams where he and several people wear masks while playing "World of Eternity," a board game full of quests and adventures. And although Seol was great at the game, he was never able to win. But now, his dreams have become reality, and humans have become game pieces!

Humanity's only hope is for Seol to recall what he did in his dreams to survive. Even though he's never won, will he be able to turn the tables and finally make his way to victory?
description.ru:
Когда я был маленьким, в своих сновидениях я попадал в иное пространство, так называемый «мир вечности». 
 Во сне я превращался во взрослого человека, одетого в причудливые одежду и маску.
 Теперь пришло время бросать кость. Игра «Мир вечности» , начавшаяся с броска костей , была судьбой? Жизнью? Или, может быть, самим миром?
 Я с удовольствием проводил время, играя в кругу незнакомых мне личностей. Пока однажды я сам не стал фигурой на игровом поле.

altTitles.ja: みーちゃんは飼われたい

description.en: Iori is a young man in his twenties who has been stressed at work, lost his cat that he had kept for many years, and is suffering from insomnia and loss of appetite. The next morning, he finds a beautiful, naked girl lying beside him...?
description.ja: 〈ウルトラジャンプ連載作品〉仕事のストレスに加え、長年飼った飼い猫を失い不眠＆食欲不振ぎみのアラサー青年いおり。疲れ切った夜、迷い込んできた黒猫を家にあげて世話すると、翌朝、全裸の美少女が横に寝ていて…‼︎?？「あたしを飼わせてあげる」ーー強引勝手気ままな彼女の正体は…？？
description.uk:
"Ми їстимемо разом, спатимемо разом і поліпшуватимемо якість життя Іорі разом".

Іорі - молодий чоловік, який на додачу до стресу на роботі ще й колись втратив улюблену кішку, а тепер страждає від безсоння й анорексії. І ось одного ранку він виявляє, що поруч з ним спить красива оголена незнайомка...

Надзвичайна героїня-цілителька та жалюгідний чоловік, який дуже любить котів, починають жити разом!

description.en: Tensions are brewing under the seemingly calm surface of the Vasilios Empire, a kingdom ruled by the Imperial Family and the Temple. Lady Medea Solon has lost her place next to Crown Prince Eros, but resolves to do whatever it will take to win back what's rightfully hers. Will she reclaim her throne?

The manga centers on three sixth graders, Yoshiki Obana, Mikoto Tajo, and Kikuri Kushida, who meet up at morning to get to the bottom of their town's "seven mysteries" as a free summer vacation project. After finishing one meeting at their "secret base", Yoshiki meets a mysterious ghost on his way home.

description.en:
"Won't you become a Goblin's bride?"   
  
In Yang-an, the capital of the Shun Dynasty Empire, there are rumors of a Goddess who sings a song that grants your wishes in your dreams if you visit a certain pharmacy. To confirm this, Sa Heonyoung, who disguises his status as a member of the royal family, goes to find the Goddess of the rumors. After listening to her song, he yearns for her, as if he is suffering from an illness…  
  
A man who must kill his own identity under a goblin's mask; and a woman who has no name or a lover, and lives only for the revenge in her mother's will. A mournful love story between a man and a woman who are the only ones who can fully understand each other.

description.ko:
"도깨비의 신부가 되지 않겠습니까?“

순나라의 황도 양안. 어느 약방에 찾아가면 신녀가 꿈속에서 소원을 이뤄 주는 노래를 불러 준다는 소문이 파다하다. 이를 검증하기 위해 신분을 속인 채 다른 이들 틈에 섞여 신녀를 찾아간 친왕, 사헌영. 그는 신녀의 노래를 듣고 난 뒤, 병을 앓듯 그녀를 찾게 되는데….

도깨비 가면을 쓴 채 자신을 죽이고 살아가야만 하는 남자. 외로운 산 속에서 하루 하루 죽음만을 기다리며 살아가는 이름 없는 여자. 온전히 자신을 알아주는 건 서로밖에 없는 남녀의 애절한 사랑 이야기.

「妳願意當鬼怪的新娘嗎？」順王朝的帝都仰安有個傳聞，城裡某間藥房有一位能用歌聲讓人在夢中願望成真的巫女。為了證實這個傳聞，順王朝親王──思軒英，隱瞞自身身分親自去見了這位巫女，然而在聽完巫女的歌聲後，彷彿得了相思病一般，一直不斷找她…。一位只能戴著鬼怪面具隱藏自己真實身分的男子、一位在孤寂的山中等待死亡日度一日的女子，相遇後發現真正理解自己的只有彼此，一則關於男女愛戀情愁的故事。【​本作品為官方正式授權之15歲版本，請讀者們多多支持。】​

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

Japanese-American Mizuki has gotten herself into a high school in Japan… but not just any school! To be close to her idol, high jumper Izumi Sano, she's going to an all-guys' high school… and disguising herself as a boy! But as fate would have it, they're more than classmates… they're roommates! Now, Mizuki must keep her secret in the classroom, the locker room, and her own bedroom. And her classmates–and the school doctor–must cope with a new transfer student who may make them question their own orientation…
description.pl: Dziewczyna imieniem Mizuki Ashiya ma swojego idola. Jest nim skoczek wzwyż Sano Izumi. Aby być blisko niego Ashiya, postanawia przenieść się do tej samej szkoły, co on w Japonii. Nie jest to jednak zwykła szkoła… a wyłącznie męska! Jakby zrządzeniem losu nie dość, że będą chodzić razem do klasy, to zostają też współlokatorami! Ashiya musi teraz bardzo uważnie pilnować swojego sekretu, bo inaczej wyleją ją ze szkoły!

Today is another peaceful day♪ (Thanks to Patra-chan's love for the Earth)

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

altTitles.th: ตั๋วโกงชีวิต

description.en:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
description.fr:
L'esprit de Lee Kyung Ho était complètement bouleversé à l'idée de mettre fin à ses jours à cause du harcèlement et de la perte de sa mère. Il essaie, mais il est sauvé. Sa détermination à se suicider séduit Sierra, une faucheuse sinistre qui lui offre plus tard un pacte. Ce pacte lui permet d'emprunter les pouvoirs des morts dans leur vie antérieure en échange de plusieurs années sacrifiées de sa vie. Afin d'atteindre ce qu'il souhaite, il finit par l'accepter.  
  
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)
description.ru: Ли Кён Хо был поглощен идеей суицида, из-за издевательств в школе и гибели его матери. Очередная попытка, но спасен. Его решимость покончить с собой каким-то образом соблазняет Сиеру, мрачного жнеца, который позже предлагает ему контракт. Этот контракт даёт возможность заимствовать способности и силы мертвых из их предыдущей жизни, в обмен на силу, он должен жертвовать годами, которые ему остались на этой земле. Ради достижения того, чего он желает, он всё таки соглашается на сделку.
description.es-la: Lee Kyung Ho queria terminar su vida debido al acoso y la pérdida de su madre. Intenta hacerlo, pero no lo consigue. Su determinación de suicidarse de alguna manera fracasa, una persona llega y le ofrece un contrato. Este contrato lo bendice con la capacidad de tomar prestados los poderes de los muertos en su vida anterior a cambio de sacrificar años de su vida. Para lograr lo que desea y el acepta el trato.

altTitles.es-la: El camino a casa después de la escuela

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.

altTitles.ja: たゆたう煙は掴めない

description.en: Chiaki, a college student without a girlfriend, meets Miyako, a waitress at a shisha store, through a matching app recommended by a friend. This is a love story that lyrically depicts a faint love that begins with a matching app and shisha.
description.pt-br: Chiaki, um estudante universitário sem namorada, conhece Miyako, uma garçonete de uma casa de shisha, através de um aplicativo de relacionamento recomendado por um amigo. Esta é uma história de amor que retrata poeticamente um sentimento inicial e delicado, nascido em um aplicativo de celular e embalado pelo aroma do shisha.

description.en:
Upon a kingdom ravaged by war, descended a Dragon promising triumph and life eternal - a proposal accepted, a proposal respected, but one that would come at a severe price for the inhabitants.

Now the kingdom is in ruins. How come? It's for amnesiacs 'Missy' and Jess to find out.

______________

Devious Miss Crimson is a short story by RedbowCR (Crimson Ribbon: Summer Rain) aiming to provide a concise but complete narrative for the reader.

My second ever manga made as I gear up to tackle my next projects, I hope you will enjoy what this fun little story can provide to you, let's look forward to the future.

More of my garbage on: https://linktr.ee/redbowcr

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

description.en:
The symbol of beauty and money, Tatiana Cartien, the most eligible bachelorette of the Freya Empire. The despair of being betrayed by her trusted fiancé lasted only a moment, as who could've known a bigger shock would happen.

"I'll only endure for a few days, getting discovered in an idiotic manners of all ways."

To think that her family, who she believed was on her side, knew her fiancé's nature. Tatiana threatened to never get married, and her mother, who once coddled her, abandoned her.

"If you say you don't want to then I guess you should leave this house."

"..."

"Of course, you should leave behind everything I've given to you."

The time she has left is one week. If she can't find someone worth marrying, she'll be kicked out onto the streets with nothing.

Just when she thought, "Is this the end?" one person came to mind! Kainel Towncent, an illegitimate child who had once been treated with contempt, who then rose from mercenary to the hailed war hero of Freya in 3 years.

A road with a dead end, there's nothing left to lose. In order to survive in this grim world, grabbing the hand of the devil is enough.

"Tatiana Cartien. No matter what anyone says from now on, you're the lady of Towncent. If you come to me with an offer of marriage first, then you need to take responsibility until the end."

---
As the beloved daughter of a viscountess and the fiancée of a duke, Tatiana Cartienne was the belle of high society. But when she refuses to marry after discovering the duke's infidelity, she begins to see that she was simply a pawn in her family's power play. In her attempt to break free, she turns to Kynell Townsend, a war hero who was once humiliated by the viscountess for his attempt to woo Tatiana. With title and fortune out of the picture, will they be able to reset their love story?
description.fr: Fille adorée d'une vicomtesse et fiancée d'un duc, Tatiana Cartien était la fleur de la haute société. Mais lorsqu'elle refuse de se marier après avoir découvert l'infidélité du duc, elle commence à comprendre qu'elle n'était qu'un pion dans l’échiquier du pouvoir de sa famille. Pour tenter de se libérer de cette dernière, elle se tourne vers Kainel Towncent, un héros de guerre qui a été humilié quelques années plutôt par la vicomtesse pour avoir tenté de séduire Tatiana. Sans titre ni fortune, parviendront-ils à relancer leur histoire d'amour ?
description.ru: Татьяне Картье осталась неделя чтобы найти мужа, после того, как он предал её. Последним, о ком она думала, был наёмник Кайнел Таунсенд. Она решает более никому не доверять, и заключить с ним брак по контракту, но... Почему её сердце так быстро бьётся?
description.uk:
Символ краси і грошей, Татьяна Картьє - найшанованіша наречена в імперії Фрея. 
ЇЇ розпач від зради власного нареченого тривав лише одну мить, адже хто б знав, що далі справи підуть тільки гірше.

"Міг почекати декілька днів, а не попастися як ідіот." 

Я вірила, що моя родина на моїй стороні, але вони знали про зраду мого нареченого. Через свої погрози, що вона ніколи не вийде заміж, мати Татьяни, яка так сильно любила її, відвернулася від неї. 
Якщо тобі щось не подобається, то можеш забиратися геть.
“... “
І звісно ж, ти повинна залишити все, що я тобі дала.
У неї залишився всього лиш тиждень. Якщо вона за цей час вона не знайде собі чоловіка, її виженуть на вулицю ні з чим.

І в мить, коли вона подумала:”Це кінець”, на думку спала одна людина!
Кайнель Таунсент, позашлюбна дитина до якої ставилися з презирством, який за три роки прославився, як герой війни Фреї.

Загнана в глухий кут, де немає нічого втрачати. Для виживання в цьому світі, потрібно схопити диявола за руку

“Татьяна Картьє, щоб хто не казав, але віднині ви леді Таунсест.
Якщо ти перша запропонувала мені одружитися, то будь готова взяти на себе відповідальність до самого кінця.”

description.en:
An office worker named Komari is saved from a monster by a mysterious vampire named Liberta.
Sex and violence ensues.

Vampire yuri action from the creator of Tadokoro-san.

altTitles.vi: Làm ơn, giúp tớ cởi nó xuống!

description.en:
There is a curse on this school. It prevents the person who commits "impure acts" from taking off his or her panties. Only the right hand of the protagonist can break the curse and remove the panties, his name is Kamite.

Kamite tells the girls that they have been cursed and that he can take off their panties, but... obviously it is almost unacceptable for them to have any man take them off...!

This is how the girls end up in a lot of trouble. But if the panties are not removed, they can get into even more trouble...
description.es: Hay una maldición en esta escuela. La cual, le impide quitarse la ropa interior a toda persona que cometa "actos impuros" dentro de la escuela. Solamente la mano derecha de Kamite es capaz de romper la maldición y quitarles la ropa interior. Él les menciona a las chicas que han sido maldecidas y que es capaz de quitarles la ropa interior, pero… ¡Obviamente es casi inaceptable para ellas que un hombre cualquiera se las quite…! Así es como las chicas terminan pasando por momentos de confusión. Pero, si no les es quitada la ropa interior, puede que tengan algo que lamentar.
description.pt-br: Existe uma maldição nesta escola. Que impede que a pessoa que cometa “atos impuros” tire sua calcinha. Só a mão direita do protagonista consegue quebrar a maldição e tirar a calcinha, seu nome é Kamite. Kamite fala para as garotas que elas foram amaldiçoadas e que ele pode tirar sua calcinha, mas… obviamente é quase inaceitável para elas que um homem qualquer a tire…! É assim que as garotas acabam passando por vários perrengues. Mas se a calcinha não for retirada, elas podem ter mais problemas ainda.

description.en: Kim Hayeon was just covering for a friend at their day job when she unexpectedly ends up inside cellist Ji Sehun’s private waiting room. Despite his immense musical talent, Sehun is aloof and cold-hearted, and doesn’t take kindly to Hayeon’s intrusion. Though he accuses her of attempted theft, he cannot get her out of his mind, and attempts to court her. But while Hayeon may be timid, she is not easily won over. If this cellist isn’t careful, he may end up being the one getting played.
description.pt-br: Kim Hayeon estava apenas cobrindo uma amiga em seu trabalho diário quando inesperadamente acaba dentro da sala de espera privada do violoncelista Ji Sehun. Apesar de seu imenso talento musical, Sehun é indiferente e insensível, e não gosta da intromissão de Hayeon. Embora ele a acuse de tentativa de roubo, ele não consegue tirá-la da cabeça e vai tentar cortejá-la. Mas enquanto Hayeon pode ser tímida, ela não é facilmente conquistada.

altTitles.ja: 復讐チャンネル ウラミン ～公開処刑ナマ配信中～

description.en:
The online video site "Uramin TV" is a popular channel that distributes videos depicting punishment on harmful people and has over 3 million subscribers. 
Minori Yoshiura, also known as "Uramin", who runs this site, has enthusiastic followers, but in fact, she was bullied horribly when she was in elementary school and became a shut-in. She vows to take revenge on her bullying perpetrators and broadcasts her revenge videos live. The number one target is Takemura Kyouka, the ringleader of bullying who has pushed her to the depths of hell and is now living a carefree life!

A massive asteroid is about to hit earth!

Humanity has failed to stop a giant asteroid from plummeting into Earth, and life as we know it has ended. An ordinary Korean office worker named Cheolsu is somehow given the chance to go back in time and prevent this catastrophe from ever happening. Does he have a chance?

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスターSPECIAL スカーレット・バイオレット

description.en: Violet, the “prince of speed” who drives Miraidon, runs through the Paldea region in search of the “secret spice” to regain the ability of Miraidon! A showdown with the Nushi Pokemon! Operation Stardust! And the other main character...!?
description.es: Violet, el “príncipe de la velocidad” que conduce a Miraidon, corre por la región de Paldea en busca de la “especia secreta” para recuperar la habilidad de Miraidon. ¡Un enfrentamiento con el Pokémon Nushi! ¡Operación Polvo de Estrellas! ¿¡Y el otro personaje principal...!?
description.ja: ミライドンを駆る“スピード王子”バイオレットが、ミライドンの能力を取り戻すべく「秘伝スパイス」を求めてパルデア地方を駆け巡る！　ヌシポケモンとの対決！　スターダスト作戦！　そしてもう一人の主人公は…!?

description.en: Despite the food shortages caused by famine, the mountain village where the protagonist Kai lives is able to pursue a somewhat better life than others by hunting wild animals. However, one day, a man who says he got lost in the mountains comes to the village. Kai is suspicious of the man, who refuses to make eye contact, but he and his family welcome him. That night, another uninvited beast though sneaks into the outskirts of the village...
description.es-la: Tercer año de la era Temmei. En medio de la escasez de alimentos provocada por la hambruna, el pueblo de montaña donde vive el protagonista Kaei consigue ganarse la vida algo mejor que los demás cazando animales salvajes. Un día, sin embargo, llega a la aldea un hombre que afirma haberse perdido en las montañas. El hombre se niega a mirar a Kaei a los ojos, pero él y su familia le reciben con los brazos abiertos. Esa noche, en las afueras de la aldea, entran más bestias no invitadas...

description.en: Young Touji is visiting his grandmother's old abode, overrun with wild greenery, on the anniversary of her death. But when someone (or something?) requests something of him, will it bring him closer to his grandmother from beyond the grave?

1-6. Collecting #1-#6  
A girl collects everything her crush touches; a man keeps a photo album of women giving him blowjobs; schoolboys plays a sexual card game; a lunchbox factory girl collects vomit; a man gathers his missing girlfriend's body parts; a suicidal girl joins a group of women who've made abortion into a grotesque art.  
  
7. Harakiri  
A world where cutting your stomach is the newest fashionable trend among schoolgirls.  
  
8. Holy Night  
Santa is terrorizing the Japanese by flooding everyone with unwanted gifts. The only way to stop him from sending more is to convince him that you're happy with what you've got, or so people think.  
  
9. Voracious Itches  
Putting worms under the skin can be an addictive pleasure.

Oniwa Asahi's just starting his high-school life, and he's decided it's time to turn over a new leaf and learn how to make friends and get to know those around him. How does someone who's terrible at interacting with other people go about doing that, though? Turns out, it's as easy as joining the Theatre Club and its quirky cast of characters, including the captain Imari, who seems to have his own issues opening up to others.

title.en: Minasama ni wa Jinken ga Gozaimasen

altTitles.ja: 皆様には人権がございません

altTitles.vi: Các ngươi không có quyền con người

description.en: XX years have passed since the enforcement of "The Human Rights Proper Use Act." In the city, "humans with rights" live prosperously, while "humans designated as livestock without rights" are displayed in shop windows. The humans used as pets, experimental animals, and meat are pitiful creatures living in a world separate from mine... or so it was supposed to be.

Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

For five years, she's been eating at the set-meal restaurant but didn't feel comfortable saying anything more, and the waitress at the restaurant who wanted to talk to that regular customer but couldn't get the words out. Their feelings are leaking out, but they just couldn't express their love for each other in many ways.

---
- **Note:**
*Kuchibeta Shokudou*, originally released under the title *Otagai Iitai Koto ga Ienai Tenin Okyakusan no Manga* (お互い言いたいことが言えない店員とお客さんの漫画), is a web manga released on the [author's Twitter account](https://twitter.com/i/events/1378283683996528643) since February 15, 2019, and it was picked up for commercial publication on December 10, 2021.
---
- [<ComicWalker>](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_EB01202726010000_68/)
- [<Pixiv Comic>](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8121)
description.ja:
５年間、入りたいと思ってもなかなか定食屋さんに入れなかったお客さんと
入ってほしいと願いつつも、なかなか入ってもらえなかった、ほんの少しお客さんの少ない定食屋の店員さん。
心の声はダダ漏れですが、お互い色んな意味で好意を伝えきれません。
じれったいふたりの関係は、友情？ それとも……？

altTitles.en: Reincarnation of the Murim Clan’s Former Ranker

description.en:
Legendary SSS-rank hunter Kang Tae-ha finally met his end. But just as he prepares to enter eternal sleep, he awakens once more in… imperial China?!

Now, he must live as Liu Xinyun, the delinquent heir to a powerful company. All he wants to do is put his hunting days behind him, but in order to survive his new power-hungry relatives, Xinyun must hone his skills again, starting from level one.

Can his own unique blend of necromancy and martial arts take him from useless bum to ultimate boss?
description.ko:
sss급 헌터 강태하
치열한 싸움 끝에 결국 죽음을 맞이했다.
그런데...
"이 돼지가 나라고?"
눈을 떠보니 무림이었고, 백운표국의 망나니 유신운이 되어있었다.
혼란스러운 죽음의 위기 속에!
"니들이 아직 내가 누군지 모르는구나?"
무림루저가 최강 사령술사로 다시 태어났다.
과연 유신운은 반대세력을 물리치고 백운표국의 국주자리를 차지할 수 있을 것인가!
description.ru:
Кан Тэ Ха, охотник SSS-ранга, в одиночку бросает вызов сильнейшей Гильдии "Грифон", но погибает после ожесточенного сражения! Однако…

—…Я стал свиньей?

Это мир Мурима? Теперь я – Ю Шин Ун, старший наследник клана Пэк Ун. Ситуация не из простых и отдыхать некогда, ведь за спиной уже строят козни!

—Неужели вы всё ещё не понимаете, кто я?

Некромантия из прошлой жизни. Боевые искусства из нынешней. Ему подвластно всё! Кажется, этот мир ждут новые потрясения!

description.en: Alex, a devoted metalhead, finds himself in deep sorrow at his band’s breakup concert. Amidst the sadness, he experiences an electrical accident due to equipment trouble… When he wakes up, he discovers he has been transported to another world! In this new world, Alex encounters situations that are a ‘metalhead’s dream,’ featuring werewolves and dragons, which excite him immensely. Determined to lead this otherworld to peace with his metal spirit, Alex sets out on an adventurous journey…
description.es: Alex, un devoto metalero, se encuentra sumido en una profunda tristeza en el concierto de disolución de su banda. En medio de la tristeza, sufre un accidente eléctrico debido a problemas con el equipo... Cuando despierta, ¡descubre que ha sido transportado a otro mundo! En este nuevo mundo, Alex se encuentra con situaciones que son el «sueño de un metalero», con hombres lobo y dragones, que le excitan enormemente. Decidido a llevar a este otro mundo a la paz con su espíritu metálico, Alex emprende un viaje lleno de aventuras...
description.ja: メタルを深く愛するアレキは、バンドの解散ライブで悲しみに暮れる中、機材トラブルで感電事故に遭う……。そして目が覚めると異世界に転移していた！？ 異世界では、狼男、ドラゴンと『メタラーの夢』であるシチュエーションに次々遭遇し、興奮するアレキ。メタル魂で異世界を平和に導こうとするが……
description.es-la: Alex, un devoto metalero, se encuentra sumido en una profunda tristeza en el concierto de disolución de su banda. En medio de la tristeza, sufre un accidente eléctrico debido a problemas con el equipo... Cuando despierta, ¡descubre que ha sido transportado a otro mundo! En este nuevo mundo, Alex se encuentra con situaciones que son el «sueño de un metalero», con hombres lobo y dragones, que le excitan enormemente. Decidido a llevar a este otro mundo a la paz con su espíritu metálico, Alex emprende un viaje lleno de aventuras...

altTitles.en: Please Marry Me With Divorce In Mind

altTitles.ja: 結婚しよう。離婚前提で。

description.en:
After turning 30 as a NEET, Kyosuke was kicked out of his parents' house. 
That's when Rui, his closest friend, proposes a solution: to get married, then divorce!


A guy and girl who've been 'just friends' for around a decade decide to enter a pretend marriage.
He's a romantic and she's just a pragmatic girl.  A pair unsuited for marriage.
What will they discover after 100 days together?

title.en: Psycho x Past: Ryouki Satsujin Sennyuu Sousa

altTitles.en: Psycho x Past: Bizarre Murder Undercover Investigation

altTitles.ja: サイコ×パスト 猟奇殺人潜入捜査

description.en: The "psycho suspense" manga follows Godai, a policeman who was removed from the investigations division of the police due to violence toward criminals. He teams up with Hidaka, a man who is a self-proclaimed "paranormal police investigator" with claims to have the ability to send Godai in the past to prevent all the horrific crimes that happened, is that even possible and what will be the consequences?

altTitles.ja: からかい上手(?)の西片さん

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong (?) si Nishikata-san

description.en: In this spinoff of "Teasing Master Takagi-san", and continuation of "Teasing Master (former) Takagi-san", Chi Nishikata tries her hardest to tease her classmate Ooshiro, but for some reason it feels like she's met him somewhere. Can she finally get one over on him and remember her past?
description.tl: Si Chi, ang minamahal na anak ng (dating) Takagi at Nishikata. Ngayon ay nasa high school na kasama ang batang lalaki sa tabi, kaya ba n'yang tuksuhin s'ya tulad ng kanyang ina?! O s'ya ba ang matutukso tulad ng kanyang ama!? Ang mga araw na puno ng pang-aasar ay magsisimula na muli— !
description.uk: Це спін-офф манг "Майстер дражнилок Такаґі-сан" та "Майстер дражнилок(колишня) Такаґі-сан". Донька головних героїв Чі іде до школи і зустрічає друга дитинства. Як складуться їх відносини і чи зможе вона подражнити хлопця?
description.pt-br: Neste spin-off de "Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san" e continuação de "Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san", Nishikata Chi se esforça ao máximo para provocar seu colega de classe Ooshiro, mas por algum motivo parece que ela o conhece de algum lugar. Ela pode finalmente superá-lo e lembrar de seu passado?

description.en:
Jung Hyunwoo is just an unlucky gamer barely making ends meet in the VR game "God Wars." He even ends up losing access to his game account due to a horrible accident and is forced to create a new character. In the process, he discovers that he has an ability that allows him to see hidden information in the game, which leads him to become a Grand Warlock. Now equipped with a mind-blowing skill and a legendary class, all that's left is for him to level up and go from zero to hero...

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_7M4wH6g1eI)
description.ko:
'재능'도, '돈'도, '운'도 없던 정현우.

"게임의 히든 정보들이 왜 보이는 거지?"

감전 사고에 당하고부터 게임 속 보이지 않아야 하는 것들이 보이기 시작했다.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_7M4wH6g1eI)

altTitles.en: Lovetrap Island - Passion in Distant Lands -

description.en:
Five travelers, 3 women and 2 men, wash ashore a remote island, survivors of ship sinking.

Finding themselves in this extreme situation, their instinct and conscience intersect and collide!
Crossing thoughts, feelings of love and hate mixed with trust and betrayal. A story of uncontrollable libido and murderous intent…

Original R18 web novel [here](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n1896br/)

title.en: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Dreaming Girl

altTitles.ja: 青春ブタ野郎はゆめみる少女の夢を見ない

altTitles.ru: Этот глупый свин не понимает мечту девочки-мечтательницы

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Yumemiru Shoujo no Yume wo Minai

description.en:
The Shouko arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga!

Just before summer vacation starts, Makinohara Shouko, a middle school second year student, met a high school student named Azusagawa Sakuta. Sakuta gave Shouko a desire to live, then...
Experience the love story, with Shouko as the main character, in a way only possible through manga.

*From ComicWalker, translated*

title.en: Luo Zhi Yongzhe - Yi Shijie Luchu Da Maoxian

altTitles.en: Naked Hero - An Exposed Adventure in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 裸之勇者-異世界露出大冒險

description.en:
A third-year high school girl wakes up in another world. But she's naked!
Let’s go on a nude adventure in another world!
